name: Dank Attack X
description:
Dank Attack X is filled with heartwarming, handmade programming art and is the perfect waste of time for anyone following at least 5 meme pages on any preferred social media platform.  

It's in very early stages and I have a bunch of ideas  for the future. Please be a part of the process by playing it and leaving awesome ideas and feedback. 

The game will remain free until final release.
